title: Academic Set 5 — Town Development & Online Shopping
description: Map showing town development over time and an essay on the impact of online shopping.

task1.title: Development of Riversdale town centre
task1.prompt: The maps below show the town centre of Riversdale in 1990 and the present day. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main changes, and make comparisons where relevant.
hints: Organise the description by areas (north, south, east, west) rather than individual items.
Highlight features that were replaced, removed or added over time.
Include an overall summary of the most significant developments.

task2.title: Advantages and disadvantages — Online shopping
task2.prompt: Nowadays many people prefer to shop online rather than in physical stores. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this trend.
outline: Introduction: paraphrase the trend and introduce both sides.
Body paragraph 1: benefits of online shopping for consumers and businesses.
Body paragraph 2: drawbacks of relying heavily on e-commerce.
Conclusion: summarise and state your overall view.
